sentences.en: Allows an inmate to fully relax and enjoy these facilities.
sentences.cn: 可以使入住者充分放松并享受其中的设施.

sentences.en: An inmate at a massive Miami prison complex is stabbed to death in the prison yard.
sentences.cn: 监狱内有囚犯被杀,原来一切都只是囚犯越狱的烟幕.

sentences.en: And in Fox River T - Bag hears an inmate talk about " the captivity of negativity. "
sentences.cn: 在狐狸河监狱, 西奥多 听到一名囚犯说到 “ 被困在消极的思想中. ”

sentences.en: He learned this song as an inmate at a Texas prison.
sentences.cn: 他在得克萨斯监狱服刑时学会了这首歌。

sentences.en: I am an inmate of that hospital.
The average inmate, however, leaves prison in about two years.
sentences.cn: 但是, 这些罪犯平均会在约两年后离开监狱.

sentences.en: The book a mold - breaking novel about a prison camp inmate, was a sensation.
sentences.cn: 这本打破当时常规,关于集中营生活的小说引起轰动.

sentences.en: The inmate outwitted his guards and escaped.

sentences.cn: 那个囚犯和他同住一起.

trans.tran_cn: 同居者，居民，（监狱里的）犯人
trans.tran_en: someone who is being kept in a prison
